original_title: Her Res～出会いをめぐる三分間の試問3本立て～
overview: A short experimental love story about the encounter between two contrasting girls.  Minami has a slightly boyish appearance, while Sumire's charming face always puts everyone at ease. But what kind of encounter, what kind of situation, what kind of decisive moment does it take for these two girls to make their feelings for each other come true?　This is a series of short stories about love and romance between two girls.
title: Her Res - Three Three Minute Questions about Encounters
